item.title: December 2022
item.description: Î∞∞Ìè¨ Shell Script ÏòàÏãú 1#!/bin/bash 2 3## ÏÉâÏÉÅ Î≥ÄÏàò ÏÑ§Ï†ï 4 5txtrst='\033[1;37m' # White 6txtred='\033[1;31m' # Red 7txtylw='\033[1;33m' # Yellow 8txtpur='\033[1;35m' # Purple 9txtgrn='\033[1;32m' # Green 10txtgra='\033[1;30m' # Gray 11 12echo -e "${txtylw}=======================================${txtrst}" 13echo -e "${txtgrn} << Ïä§ÌÅ¨Î¶ΩÌä∏ üßê >>${txtrst}" 14echo -e "${txtylw}=======================================${txtrst}" 15 16## Î≥ÄÏàò ÏÑ§Ï†ï 17PROJECT_PATH=/home/ubuntu/nextstep/infra-subway-deploy 18 19## ÌîÑÎ°úÏ†ùÌä∏ Í≤ΩÎ°úÎ°ú Ïù¥Îèô 20function changeDirectoryToProject() { 21 echo -e "${txtgrn}>> Move to Project Directory${txtrst}" 22 cd $PROJECT_PATH 23 24} 25 26 27## Ï†ÄÏû•ÏÜå pull 28function pull() { 29 echo -e "" 30 echo -e "${txtgrn}>> PULL main BRANCH ${txtrst}" 31 git pull origin main 32} 33 34## gradle build 35function build() { 36 echo -e "" 37 echo -e "${txtgrn}>> BUILD${txtrst}" 38 .
